conversation.message_text: Stately: Welcome to Stately! Get excited, your Sharp Plan Stately box is being curated by your stylist now. Don't forget to visit the Stately Member dashboard and fill out your Additional Style Preferences: https://statelymen.attn.tv/a9nOM4wRQzot

Stately: Thanks for your order 867656! Your stylist is personalizing your box. 
View your order status: https://statelymen.attn.tv/ahnQRtkNH9KO

Stately: Have you filled out your Additional Style Preferences yet? This is perfect place for you to share info with your stylist about you, your style, lifestyle, fits, preferences, inspo photos and so much more. Help your stylist nail your boxes! https://statelymen.attn.tv/aQnjJmVKM1vh

Stately: Your order just shipped with UPS! Your Stately box is on its way.
Track your order: statelymen.attn.tv/axl1P0iyBqoB

Stately: Get excited, your Stately box is almost here! Your order 867656 is out for delivery with UPS.
Track your order: statelymen.attn.tv/apzIguvyWttp

Stately: It's here! Your Stately order has been delivered. 
Track your order: statelymen.attn.tv/aTg4FFbsERDK

Email us at concierge@statelymen.com if there is anything we can do to improve your experience, and keep an eye out for your order feedback survey!
Stately: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Stately.
Stately: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Stately: Hi, I'm Jenny - Lead Stylist at Stately. 

Ready to elevate your wardrobe and get a bonus 2-piece outfit in your first 5 boxes? Use code 5BONUSFITS at checkout - statelymen.attn.tv/aDsCbC-Wg9_m 

Need help? I'd love to find the perfect plan for your style needs. Text me back with any questions!
Stately: Don't forget to save our contact info for exclusive updates!
The discount code doesn't work
Stately: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you please let me know what error you are getting when applying the code? Also, please send a screenshot of the item/s in your cart so I can check. Thank you!
I just applied it to my subscription. Is there something you have to do with your cart
Stately: Got it. Please note that the code is only valid on the Luxe, Regal, and Presidential plans. I hope this clarifies it.
I just changed it to the luxe plan and it still didn't work
Stately: Thanks for letting me know. Can you please send me a screenshot of the error message you're getting, along with the item(s) in your cart? This will help me sort it out for you.

send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS
dos_and_donts: Close the convo once the client takes over
Do use the Holiday Discounts template if you are unsure of the promotion

Birkenstock: Hey, Carrieâ€”thanks for visiting.

Shop now: https://birkenstock.attn.tv/aDPyVrdqSWwD .
Birkenstock: You won't find these anywhere else. Shop Black Kyoto, London Leather & more exclusives: birkenstock.attn.tv/arlrSGvjQTwN .
Birkenstock: Just released in online exclusives. Shop Black Kyoto, Tobacco London & Mocha Boston Chunky: birkenstock.attn.tv/aI0FFc7-s7F7 .
Hi, I e-mailed Customer Service after we chatted and have heard nothing back. Sent the pics, explained I needed a size smaller, and no response.
Birkenstock: Thanks for reaching out, and I'm sorry to hear that! Could you please let me know more regarding your concern? I would be happy to help you further.
These are the chef shoes I ordered. They are brand new. He tried them on and they are really big. I just want to exchange for the same chef shoes a size smaller.

Birkenstock: Thank you for sending over the picture. Is this the shoe you purchased on 09/21/25? If so, I'm afraid items can only be returned in their original condition and packaging within 30 days of delivery. More details at the link below: https://birkenstock.attn.tv/aOpQc9J71Y6h

For more details, I recommend waiting for a response from our specialized team they're best equipped to help with this type of issue.
6es, but I didnt receive them for quite awhile, and I bought them for Christmas. They are in the box they arrived in, and never worn.

Birkenstock: Thanks for clarifying! Can you let me know when the shoes were delivered? If they arrived within the last 30 days, you'll be able to return or exchange them using the link I shared earlier.

Truthfully, I'm thinking it was sometime in December, but Im not 100% sure. Should I call Customer Service or j7st send them back with a note? They never sent an invoice with the box which was really weird.
Template used: "How do I start a reutn?"; last updated: 2023-10-27 20:40:47.893

Birkenstock: I understand. Can you try initiating the return through this link: https://birkenstock.attn.tv/aK3nob13Yn89 If the shoes were delivered within 30 days, the system should allow the return to go through.

DeepDiscount: Hi, it's Jordan. I'm a personal concierge here to answer questions or share give recommendations. Is there anything I can help you with today?

https://deepdiscount.attn.tv/a5CrcLS21NGX .

Yes, you can. I was looking at some Hot wheels the transformer Hot wheels you had a listed for 2999 but you guys never have any discounts for them at all only for CDs and movies when were you guys have a good sale on Hot wheels 20% or 30% off.
DeepDiscount: I'm sorry, I don't have information on upcoming sales at the moment, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!
Well, no deals on Hot wheels
DeepDiscount: Sorry about that! If they are offered on sale, we'll be sure to let you know. Let me know if there's anything else I can help with.
Yes, there is something else you could help me with. Can I use your employee discount? I would appreciate it to check out.
DeepDiscount: I'm so sorry but this isn't something we offer. Kindly keep an eye out for future deals. Thank you and I'm sorrry again for the inconvenience.
Can you send me a coupon or something for discount because I cannot use your employee discount

DeepDiscount: Thanks for getting back to me! I'm sorry, I don't have any codes available at the moment, but our deals will always be shared with our SMS subscribers or on our website, so keep an eye out!
I have kept my eyes open but noting
Something

DeepDiscount: I understand, and thank you for always checking in on our deals. I'll be sure to share your feedback with my team to help improve future offers. You can also explore our current deals here: https://deepdiscount.attn.tv/a_ImmUWjltRs
